item.title: Hugh Jackman, Kate Hudson Start a Neil Diamond Tribute Band in ‘Song Sung Blue’ Trailer
item.description: Writer-director Craig Brewer’s film is based on a true story and hits theaters later this year from Focus.

item.title: Kristen Bell, Tony Goldwyn and Nate Burleson Join 2025 Global Citizen Festival
item.description: Bill Nye, Adam Lambert, Danai Gurira and Liza Koshy will also serve as cohosts of the Sept. 27 event.
